content.en: Fuzzy transportation algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to solve fuzzy transportation problems. These algorithms aim to convert the fuzzy problems into crisp ones, making them easier to solve using classical transportation algorithms. Additionally, new methods have been proposed to solve transportation problems with different types of fuzzy numbers, such as generalized trapezoidal, triangular, and pentagonal fuzzy numbers. These advancements in algorithmic approaches offer efficient solutions to transportation problems with changing restrictions and different types of fuzzy numbers.
content.da: Fuzzy transportalgoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at løse fuzzy transportproblemer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at omdanne de fuzzy problemer til skarpe, hvilket gør dem lettere at løse ved hjælp af klassiske transportalgoritmer. Derudover er der blevet foreslået nye metoder til at løse transportproblemer med forskellige typer af fuzzy tal, såsom generaliserede trapez-, trekant- og pentagonale fuzzy tal. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmiske tilgange tilbyder effektive løsninger på transportproblemer med skiftende begrænsninger og forskellige typer af fuzzy tal.
